summary: "West Side Story" (2021) is a musical romance film directed by Steven Spielberg. It's based on the famous 1957 stage musical and stars Ansel Elgort and Rachel Zegler. The movie updates the classic love story between rival gangs in New York City. With music by Leonard Bernstein and lyrics by Stephen Sondheim, it received lots of praise for its performances, direction, and musical numbers. Despite some financial losses, critics consider it one of the best musical films ever made.
title: West Side Story (2021 film)
